name: Dive.io
description: The dive.io API (Application Programming Interface) allows desktop applications and other websites to access dive.io data storage. The API is a HTTP-based REST API, and provides data in JSON and XML (HTML is also provided as is for the read-only methods, but not recommended since its format might change).
